com.cerner.bunsen.spark

Class SparkRowConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cerner.bunsen.spark.SparkRowConverter

  • public class SparkRowConverter
extends Object
    Support for converting FHIR resources to Apache Spark rows and vice versa.

    • Method Detail

      • forResource

        public static SparkRowConverter forResource(ca.uhn.fhir.context.FhirContext context,
                                            String resourceTypeUrl)
        Returns a row converter for the given resource type. The resource type can either be a relative URL for a base resource (e.g., "Condition" or "Observation"), or a URL identifying the structure definition for a given profile, such as "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-patient".
        Parameters:
        context - the FHIR context
        resourceTypeUrl - the URL of the resource type
        Returns:
        a row converter instance.

      • forResource

        public static SparkRowConverter forResource(ca.uhn.fhir.context.FhirContext context,
                                            String resourceTypeUrl,
                                            List<String> containedResourceTypeUrls)
        Returns a row converter for the given resource type. The resource type can either be a relative URL for a base resource (e.g. "Condition" or "Observation"), or a URL identifying the structure definition for a given profile, such as "http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-patient".

        Resources that would be contained must be statically declared through this method via similar URLs.

        Parameters:
        context - the FHIR context
        resourceTypeUrl - the URL of the resource type
        containedResourceTypeUrls - the list of URLs of contained resource types
        Returns:
        an Avro converter instance.

      • resourceToRow

        Converts a given FHIR resource to a Spark row.

        Returns:
        the row

      • toDataFrame

        public org.apache.spark.sql.Dataset<org.apache.spark.sql.Row> toDataFrame(org.apache.spark.sql.SparkSession spark,

        Returns a dataframe.
        Parameters:

        resources - the resources to convert into Spark rows.
        Returns:
        a dataframe containing the resources in row form.
